description: Core frontend developer in an agile tech team, migrating the frontend of old frameworks to modern tech for a global German automotive company. Developing internal tools and reporting systems to generate KPIs and manage global production cycles using key manufacturing data.

Delivered payments north of Â£1.6 billion to UK citizens in need, during Covid, and the Cost of Living Crisis. Operated across the stack delivering features as a junior developer, having opportunities to lead production runs and deployments.

Successfully completed a 12 week Full Stack JavaScript, and Software Consulting Essentials Bootcamp. Covered a wide array of Full Stack concepts and technologies, including cloud engineering with Amazon Web Services. Culminated in a capstone 3-tier application project, presenting to Accenture Leadership.

Collaborated directly alongside Collate's founder in an operations, project-, and and product management oriented role, in a very early stage startup based in London. Heavy focus on business requirements analysis and other BA oriented activities.

Completed a Bachelor of Science in Physical Geography with a heavy focus on Geographic Information Systems, at Durham University. Achieved a 1st overall, with a 1st in my Dissertation, covering landslide susceptibility prediction modelling.
